1.content:
Original Chapter by Kardo

It is time for your first, and most important, decision. Choose a storyline!

Descriptions:

Mental Growth: Growth is caused by the mind, either one's own mind or the mind of another.

Common Giantesses: Many/all women are giantesses.

Deserted Island: The prerequisite deserted island storyline. Girl is either already huge or grows huge somehow.

Big happy family: A variety of giant family member stories, such as giant sisters, daughters, wives, etc.
1.title: Storyline Choice

11.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

And what form shall this mental growth take?

Trigger: A non-emotional trigger of one's growth. i.e. food, water, etc.

Personal Growth: Person can grow themselves with their thoughts.

Growth of others: Person can grow other people with their thoughts.

Emotion-based growth: Person grows from feeling certain emotions.
11.title: Mental Growth

choices: Other people's size and your own size!
112.content:
Okey who are you?

Are you the person who can change other people's size?
Or can you change your own size with thoughts?
You can change other people's and even your own size? Oh boy!
112.title: Personal Growth

12.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

Hmm.. Interesting.

Please elaborate.

Natural Giantesses: Women are naturally giant-sized.

Lost civilization: Explorers stumble onto a completely female nation, completely isolated from the rest of the world.

Friendly Aliens: Your spaceship crashlands on another planet, where you are befriended by those that live there, all female of course.

Alternate Dimension: You stumble onto another dimension. Fortunately, the inhabitants seem quite friendly...
12.title: Common Giantess

121.content: In this world it was normal for earthqakes every day because of the girls that would walk the street daily as the advage fulliy grown girl was 350 feet the road where built for them and cars even though those who where marryied just got there wifes to take them to work as it was faster and they got to send more time with them. The gril got consturction jobs as they ccould take materials fastr then trucks and most didn't need cranes as they would just use a gril to lift the materials. Whilethe girls were as most girls were 350 feet tal they didn't hurt a fly even if they tried as men found out as a gril was not watching were she was going and steaped on a bus by accdient and it was fine.
121.title: Natural Giantesses

choices: Your wife, who came with you on this trip.
A long lost friend, thought dead for years.
A mysterious woman who seems to think very highly of you.
A stranger who crash landed here earlier than you did.
13.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

Interesting...

Who is the female in this story?
13.title: Deserted Island

choices: Footprints! Someone else is here too!
Huge Footprints! Someone giant is here!
Colossal Footprints! Someone 100+ feet tall is here!
133.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

You were on vacation, flying over the pacific ocean in your little private airplane, when you happened to crash into the ocean. The last few moments were terrifying, as the sea circled below you. You blacked out before you actually hit the water, and the next thing you knew, you were passed out on a beach. You cough, getting rid of the water that leaked into your throat, and slowly stand up.

"Well," you think, "At least I'm ok, and I always did want to have an adventure." You slowly look around. You appear to be on a sandy beach which stretches for a long way each direction. In front of you is a large jungle, which blocks your view of everything farther in front of you. You quickly decide to stay along the beach so as not to get lost, and begin to walk, when you happen to look at the ground and see...
133.title: Crash!

choices: A former scientist, lab coat and all
A literal goddess, golden bracelets and such
A "little" girl, cute backpack and everything
1332.content:
As rare as finding gold buried in a pile of rubble, footprints of unimaginable size can be seen expanding across the beach shore. It was a strange sight indeed, it obviously belonged to a human being seeing as the form of the print resembles that of a person's, but you couldn't even imagine how enormous that person must be for these prints to be possible.

You began to follow the bizarre trail without having in mind any kind of profit for doing so, your curiosity had clouded your judgment as you continued to follow walk towards possible danger.

Eventually the rest of the trail vanished into the ocean, which meant that the same had probably happened with the entity. Then the thought of disappointment crossed your mind. It's mostly likely that it had already left, it was certainly large enough to reach the mainland within a day or few hours.

As your thoughts continued to wander, suddenly an enormous hand had emerged from ocean, your reaction time was so poor that the hand had already rapped it's finger tightly around before you even noticed. It's seems to be a feminine hand judging by the large fingernails and elegant form.

You began rising very quickly high up into the sky. You closed your eyes tightly by the thought and when you opened them again the giantess you saw was....
1332.title: The Titan of the beach

1333.content:
Original chapter by NoStory

You see colossal footprints! Someone or something, is on this island. The footprints are human shaped but you cannot believe that it was made by a human since that thing would be upwards of a 100 feet! The footprints seem to travel inland.

" Ok since the creature went into the jungle, I'll stay out here." you think, at the moment you cannot be sure of the creature's personality, whether it wouldn't eat you or kill you upon seeing you. You were unarmed at the moment, you definitely weren't planning on getting washed up on an island with giant monsters on them.

As you are walking along the beach, you can hear the sounds of wild animals form the jungles, some you recognise , others you don't when....
1333.title: Colossal Footprints! Someone 100+ feet tall is ...

14.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

And just how did your family member(s) grow?
14.title: Big Happy Family

142.content:
Original chapter by NoStory

Ok before we begin, who is it that is a giantess?
142.title: They're natually giant sized.

1423.content: How about this?
1423.title: Someone else.

choices: Your wife, who is already making food.
Your daughter, who greets you brightly.
Your older sister, who greets you with a small smile.
143.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

You sit up. Sweat is pouring down your face. You have just had a bizarre dream, but you cannot remember anything about it. You shake your head to clear it, only to find that the world feels... different somehow. You stretch, then climb out of bed. You decide to go eat breakfast, because it might clear your head.

You are met in the kitchen by...
143.title: You do something to them

choices: Your sister, munching on some toast.
Your wife, humming as she fries some eggs.
Your daughter, as she eats her pancakes.
144.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

You can not help but feel as though something is different today. The world seems brighter somehow, as though something good would happen today. You walk into the kitchen to eat breakfast, when you feel a strange sensation. It was as though the kitchen was being being filled with an amazing power. You look around to see where the presence is coming from to see...
144.title: They do something to themselves.

choices: Erin takes out something you haven't seen before.
You go out , things still are normal.
1441.content:
Original chapter by NoStory

You see your sister munching on some toast. Her name was Erin and she 16 this year, she had long brown hair that came halfway down her back and she had ice blue eyes. " Hello there little brother.' she said as you came in. " What do you mean little?" you asked her.

You were at least 8 inches taller than her and definitely the older one so it would seem logical for her to call you the big brother. " I mean you're not really my big brother, at least you won't be in a few moments." said Erin. ' You're weird.' you reply.

" I think you have at most a week left as my big brother before things change.' Erin said, finishing her toast.
1441.title: Your sister, munching on some toast.

choices: Anna seems normal but is 3 inches taller
They enter the living room to find an 8 foot Anna
Crash out back! 50 foot Anna in the backyard
Earthquake! Anna is now a Timid 125 foot Titan!
1443.content:
You look around to see where the presence
is coming from to see
Your 5 year old daughter Anna eating her pancakes.


You can’t shake a strange feeling.
Your wife was a scientist after all with
a few out there experiments.


You had no idea that this morning your wife
had the gall to use your daughter Anna
as a guinnea pig at least not until
Anna spoke.


“Mommy after I have seconds can
I try the bright tickle gun in your lab
some more?”


“Sweetie mommy said not to tell daddy”


“Wait what gun? Susan what did you do?!”


“Mommy has the really big gun that
makes tingly light that tickles! She said
If I play with the light I might even finally
stop being short that’s why I wants ta
try it again some more”



“That’s nice sweetie but mommy and daddy
need to talk also sweetie I told you
it may be awhile before you can play
again cause it broke”



Your wife shooed out Anna.
When she returns she speaks first.


“Listen I’m sorry
I was going to tell you eventually and...”


“And What Susan?
Anna is a person and our daughter no less
Not one of your test subjects!
How could you Shoot our little girl”


“I know but this device is harmless
and Anna wanted to”


“How can a gun be harmless and of
course she wanted to! You took
advantage of her innocence”


“It’s not a real gun it’s a laser
and it’s an Enlarging Ray that apparently
doesn’t work especially now that
the circuits overloaded and fried”



“That’s not the point Susan.
Our daughter isn’t a lab rat
plus why would you do that”



“Well duh she’s always been short
for her age and I figured I’d try to correct that
for our girl and I even let her wear
her favorite blue skirt, panties , pink shirt
and no shoes”


“And what if she got hurt or something else
happened”


“Like I said the devise was only
designed to enlarge the target and it
didn’t work. I measured Anna and she
hasn’t changed or suffered harm”


There was a pause before Susan continues
“Look if you don’t believe me let’s go
and check on Anna together”
1443.title: Your daughter, as she eats her pancakes.

145.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

Growth Spurts: Either your sister or your daughter start going through growth spurts, but don't stop having them!

Measuring up: You are measuring your daughter/sister, when your hand slips and you mark a bit too high on the wall. To your surprise, they grow to reach that height.
145.title: More!

choices: Your older sister, who still hopes for a growth spurt.
Your younger sister, who happens to still be growing.
Your daughter, who eager to see if she's growing still.
1452.content:
"Hey, wake up!" You hear a voice calling to you from the side of your bed. Groggily, you stretch out, before turning to who was trying to get your attention.

It was...
1452.title: Measuring up

choices: See if you actually did just control her height.
Wait until tomorrow to measure her again.
See if this works on someone else?
14521.content:
It was your older sister, Emily, barely older than you at 20, you being 18.

"Wake up! Sleepy head..." She sighs.

"I'm up, I'm up." You say, chucking a pillow at her. She catches it without effort.

"Nice try. C'mon! Get up and measure me!" She throws the pillow back onto the bed. You chuckle and roll your eyes. Emily is short, emphasis on short. At only 4'10", she was smaller than anyone you've known. After hoping for a growth spurt that never came, she eventually read online that people could have late growth spurts, and has now been hoping to have one ever since.

"I already measured you last week, what difference will this week make?" You ask, finally getting out of bed. Emily sticks her tongue out at you.

"Even so, it's not going to kill you to measure me. Now hurry up!" She said, jolting out of your room. You follow, rolling your eyes seeing her already up against the wall you have measured her at before. Sighing, you relent and grab a pencil.

"Don't stand on your tip toes. Don't want to make you too tall." You say, getting ready to make the mark.

"Oh ha ha, just hurry up." She retorts. Just as you were about to mark her height, which had of course nothing changed, your hand, for whatever reason, shoots up and marks about 3 inches above her head.

"Crud, sorry Emily, I accidentally..." You are cut off by Emily suddenly growing those three inches to reach the mark. You blink, looking down to see Emily's feet still planted flat on the ground.

"Well? Anything?" Emily asked, seemingly totally unaware that she just miraculously grew right before your eyes.

"Um, well-" Not waiting for your response, she turns around to see for herself.

"Yes! I grew! In your face mister 'people at your age don't grow anymore'!" She teased, ecstatic that she's now 5'1", meanwhile you're still trying to process what just happened. Now you just need to decide what to do now.
14521.title: Your older sister, who still hopes for a growth...

145211.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: She tries to push your hand higher and higher
145211.content:
This should be impossible. Did she really grow 3 inches before your eyes? Nah you clearly remeasured her. But how could she have grown 3 inches in one day? It was worht testing again.

Emily was oblivious to your thoughts, waving her arms around in some kind of victory dance.

“Haha in your face!”

“Let me measure you again.”

Emily stuck her tongue out again
“Why? Can’t you accept I’m taller.”

“Uhh…” You try to think of something quickly ”You might be taller than I realise.”

“Oh har har.”

“Let me just try please. You might even gain an inch.”

Emily rolls her eyes.

“Fine whatever. But only one more. A growing girl needs to eat!”

You put the marker at 5’4. Before you’re very eyes she shoots up to that. It really wasn’t a trick of the light. But how is this possible? Emily looks at you impatiently.

“Come on what’s the delay? We know it says 5’1.”

She’s still oblivious? How can this be?

“Actually you’re 5’4.”

She laughs derisively.

“Pfft like I’m falling for that.”

“It’s true, doesn’t everything seem shorter to you?”

“I don’t feel any different.”

You point to the mark on the wall.

“Look at the mark.”

She turned her head to the wall and gasps. She can clearly see her earlier 5’1 marking and her head well above it.

“Holy cow! I grew again! You sure you aren’t messing with me?”

“No. I don’t know but you’re taller. Look at our heights.”

She walked up to you smiles. Before you were more than a head and half taller than her, now she nearly reaches your chin. Her smile becomes a wide grin. She stands on her tip toes, looking into your face.

“Ha you better watch out I’m catching up!”

For a second she stands there, grinning from ear to ear. Then she grabs your hand.

“Measure me again! Measure me again!” Emily is actually jumping up and down now. You don’t remember the last time you saw her this excited.

Before you can even reply, she pushed your arm back with unexpected for, nudging the market just past her previous heigh.
145211.title: Hope I haven't got rusty

choices: Skip until tomorrow to grow her again.
Maybe try seeing if you can grow her some other way?
145212.content:
All day yesterday, Emily would not let you hear the end of it. She was overjoyed to finally be taller. While she was still quite short, she was at least happy to be in the 5 foot range. You on the other hand were just left confused. Confused at how you seemingly were able to control your sisters height by simply accidentally measuring her above her current height.

Today, the now 5'1" Emily had woken you up once again, seemingly more eager than ever to be measured again. Back already against the wall and standing tall, Emily awaited your marking. Marker in hand, you sigh and shake your head, smiling. Even if Emily had magically grew, she was the same as ever. As you are about to mark her height, you consider something, what if you were to mark below her height. She grew when you marked above her head, she logically, she might just shrink if you mark below her head.

Seeing if Emily was paying attention to you, you mark just below an inch below her head. Determining that you were done, she twirled around to see the marking, only to turn towards you unamused.

"What are you trying to do, shrink me?" She chuckles. You play it off by rolling your eyes.

"Maybe, don't need you growing too much now." She playfully pushes you lightly as you both have a little laugh.

"C'mon now, mark my actual height." She says, standing back up to the wall once more. You give in and decide to mark 2 inches above her head, watching as she grows to reach it, letting her know that she's 5'3" now, which of course pleases her.

"Hey Emily," you get her attention, "did you notice or feel anything... strange when I marked your height?" She looks at you confused.

"No, not really. Why? Did you do something?" She smirks, raising an eyebrow.

"No, just wondering." You wave it off. Emily shrugs after a moment before going to marvel at her new height.

It seems that she doesn't notice the growth at all, seeming to think that she was that tall since she woke up. You guess that no matter how big you make her, she will never notice when you grow her, and think that the growth was natural. Finally accepting what you thought impossible, you go on with your day and living with your 'growing' sister.
145212.title: Wait until tomorrow to measure her again.

choices: Sue spends the day super excited
14522.content:
"Hey, wake up!" You hear a voice calling to
you from the side of your bed.
Groggily, you stretch out, before turning
to who was trying to get your attention.



It was your 4 year old little sister
Sue.


“Big brother please measure me?!”


You shook the cobwebs from your head.
Sue was still giddy and energetic.


“Big brother please”

You relented realizing she wasn’t giving up.

“Fine”

You wake up and grab a marker not realizing
it was special, Magical and somehow the
only one in the house.


You have Sue go against the height chart.

“I’m sure that unfortunately you’re still
as short for your age as you were 3 days
ago sorry to say”


“That’s mean big brother you know I
hate being baby sized”


You look at her previous marks of
2 feet 7 inches marked multiple times.
Your poor sisters growth seemed stunted
for quite some time now.


You consider messing with her and
marking 3ft when you sneezed.
Your hand slips and you marked
3 foot 10 by mistake.


You’re about to erase it when
Sue feels tingling but doesn’t notice.


You feel you must be going crazy as
Sue appears to slowly swell in perfect proportions
in size clothes and all until she matches the
height you marked.


“Well big brother what’s taking so long?
Did I grow any? Huh? Did I?”



You were speechless.
You had to verify this was real
So you marked 4 foot 2.
Sure enough Sue swells again.


“You didn’t feel anything did you Sue?”


“Just this weird tingle but that’s not
impotent did I grow or not”


You lament.
“Yea a lot”


What next?
14522.title: Your younger sister, who happens to still be gr...

15.content:
Giantess Dreams: You go to sleep, never to wake up again. Good thing this dream has giantess in it.

Alternate Universe: You either travel to or are transported to another universe where the women there are either natural giants or grow to become giantesses.

Experiment: A women or a group of women are part of a expirement that leads to them growing.

Food growth: If a women eats all or certain foods, she end up growing from it!
15.title: More Choices

155.content:
The virus
The world has been hit by a virus that only affects girls and makes them grow the bigger they grow the kinder and gentler they get.

The next generation
As the generations go on the girl have gotten larger and larger
155.title: Even more choices.

1553.content:
Alright, why not I add several more choices to the mix to spice things up a bit.

Goddesses: I am surprised why this one wasn’t used, but perhaps certain women or stuff like that grow to gigantic height and because they are so kind and gentle, they are worshipped as goddesses and they of course has special powers that helps the world.

Girlzillas: Now, I know what you are thinking, how can this be a good idea when they are known of being destructive... well let’s just say that certain girls grow to Japanese Giant Monster height and also gains strange powers and transformations, but instead of rampaging cities, they actually live among the people around the world. They are still recognized as giant monsters however, but they get along with the humans greatly, etc.

More options
1553.title: Even more choices.

15532.content:
Met Lily or Horse Women as she is more commonly known as now. Lily was a normal human like anyone on that day when the girlzillas rose and her body transformed and grew luckily one of her powers was for her clothes to grow with her. But now she a 200 ft Horse Women with the powers of healing, repairing any damage, and the as her last power one sh barely uses growth. With growth she can make herself 300 ft for the rest of the day.

Lily's home city is Seattle, California. Then there was you her boyfriend, but you couldn't lie it was still weird having a 200 ft horse girlfriend that once was human. Roughly 10% of women have experienced the change and world was on its head for the first few years with the women proving that they would hurt anyone.
15532.title: Girlzillas

15533.content:
Alright, perhaps it is time for us to introduce the Robots and Androids to this story. Perhaps it could be scientists who could have made a robot or an android giant girl who is lovable to the people or what not? Perhaps aliens has a robot that is like us, or stuff like that. They could look like us, or not.

Wanna do this option?
15533.title: Robots/Androids

info.brief_description: A rather random collection of Giantess storylines.
info.description:
This is a revival of a interactive from one of my favorite authors. I tried to recover as much as I can, but many chapter were lost and the few chapters that were not lost had lost a good majority of thier context.

This story is a collection of many different possible giantess storylines.

Rules:

-Giantesses MUST be gentle (Gentle in this case defined as kind/good/friendly etc, no violence unless it is for the greater good.)

-Giantesses MUST have some form of clothes on at all times. No Nudity! (Exception: Robots/Androids etc.)

-Do not kill any characters

-Do not end the stories.

-Chapters must be written in second-person perspective ("You walk down the street" etc.)

-Unless it is a choice chapter, please write at least 2 paragraphs.

-With the axception of the family storyline, keep giantess age 16+.

Have fun!
